homepage.browseTasksSubtitle: Get paid to get things done!
homepage.description1: Whether you're new in town or consider yourself a local, Taskorilla helps you get tasks done locally or earn cash by helping others.
homepage.description2: Big jobs, small jobs, or anything in between, find trusted helpers or professionals, or offer your skills, and get results quickly and safely.
homepage.postTaskSubtitle: Get help to get things done locally!

landing.brainyBrawnyText: Skilled, reliable, and clever. Our helpers tackle tasks big and small, from everyday errands to professional services. Show off your skills, services, or professional role, earn badges, collect reviews, and get noticed.
landing.communityText: Taskorilla is not just a service. It is a community of smart, strong helpers and taskers making life easier. Shareable profiles, badges, and discoverable skills make it simple, fun, and effective.
landing.fastLocalText: Helpers nearby see your tasks instantly. They can submit offers, and chat in real time. Taskers can search for helpers by skills, services, or professional role to find the perfect match.
landing.flexibleText: Set your budget, choose the best fit, and stay in control. Your information stays private, and instant alerts keep you in the loop. Post tasks and offer help without juggling multiple accounts.
landing.heroSubtitle:
Simple errands or tricky challenges, Taskorilla connects you with Helpers who think fast, work smart, and get things done without the hassle.

By using our platform, you're not just getting tasks done, you're also supporting the local economy and helping skilled Helpers earn a fair living.
landing.mascotText: Post your task today and let Taskorilla handle the heavy lifting, with brains, brawn, and brilliance.
landing.step1Text: Need something done in Portugal? Post as many tasks as you like for free, set a budget or request a quote, and Helpers can send offers instantly. When you accept an offer, you pay your agreed amount plus a €2 fee. Funds are only released when the job is completed. Get things done quickly with trusted Helpers.
landing.step2Text: Pick up extra work, use your skills, and get hired fast. Get paid on completion, minus a 10% commission. Build your reputation with badges, reviews, and a shareable profile. Perfect for professionals and handymen.
landing.step3Text: Message your Helper or Tasker, track progress, share photos, and mark the task complete when it’s done. Leave and receive reviews to build trust and show reliability. Stay in control every step of the way.
landing.trustText: Reviews go both ways. Taskers can review helpers, and helpers can review taskers. Track progress, upload photos, and see verified feedback so everyone knows who's reliable.

modal.loginRequiredCreateTask: You need to log in to create a task. Your form data has been saved and after you log in, your task will be automatically created and you'll be taken to your new task page.
modal.loginRequiredMessage: You must be logged in to view task details, post tasks, or access messages.
